Can you please send a photo of the item you received showing the color?

scenarios.customerMessage1: Your website says i could receive up to 30% discount if I qualify for HSA/FSA/HRA.  I have submitted the questionnaire and received the LMN. How do I get my discount?
scenarios.AgentMessage1: Bonafide: Good question! I'll check this now with the team and get back to you as soon as I have a response. Please hang tight!
scenarios.customerMessage2: Also, it says I can save up to 25% when I bundle.  I'm have subscriptions on Thermella, Relizen and the multi-vitamin. It appears as though I'm only getting a 15% discount.  Why is that?
scenarios.AgentMessage2: Bonafide: Can you please send me a screenshot of what you're seeing on your end as a price for the subscription? I'll be more than happy to look into this for you!
scenarios.customerMessage3: The Relizen shows a price reflecting a $30 discount for points applied. Both it and Thermella are typically discounted 15% and the multi-vitamin has no discount currently.  I just recently received the LMN with the most recent ordered placed on Jan 15th.
scenarios.SystemMessage12:
CX: Your website says i could receive up to 30% discount if I qualify for HSA/FSA/HRA. I have submitted the questionnaire and received the LMN. How do I get my discount?

it says I can save up to 25% when I bundle. I'm have subscriptions on Thermella, Relizen and the multi-vitamin. It appears as though I'm only getting a 15% discount. Why is that? Multivitamin not listed as bundle option
scenarios.AgentMessage3: Bonafide: Thanks for the screenshot, and I understand. For our bundle offer, it's Buy 2, save 15% or Buy 3 or more, save 25%. Unfortunately, it looks like the Multivitamin is not part of our bundle offer at this time. I'll check on this with my team as well. I'll keep you posted.

I'm very sorry for the disappointment this causes, and I truly appreciate you taking the time to reach out and explain the situation.

scenarios.customerMessage1: How can do an exchange?
scenarios.AgentMessage1:
Comfrt: I'm happy to help! If you want to you can swap your item for a different size or color (based on availability), and your replacement will ship once, your return has been received and processed.

In order to qualify for an even exchange all items must be approved/requested within 30 days of delivery. Unfortunately, anything after the 30 day window period can not be approved. All exchanges must be in exact condition with no signs of wear and tear, stains or other signs of usage; including in the original poly bag with SKU to return in. 

You can start your return here: https://comfrt.attn.tv/aarEvLt1_iBX/#/ and you can check out our detailed return policy here: https://comfrt.attn.tv/a_dV1Sxp02YS

escalate: When ESC on weekends, use WKD shortcut
Don‚Äôt send to CS for this brand, unless instructed by a template
If cx follows up after not receiving a response to an escalation after to 2 days, re-ESC the convo
ESC immediately if cx haven't received a confirmation email
ESC immediately post-purchase shipping issues
ESC immediately all order tracking-related/order delay inquiries
ESC even if cx doesn't provide an image needed for escalation
ESC if cx want to speak to a representative & need additional assistance after using the PS shortcut
ESC all snug attachment & snug safety related inquiries
ESC if cx say they've emailed & haven't heard back
ESC inquiries about their TikTok order or store
ESC if cx asks for other options or raises issues about the return policy, or if they flag anything pain-related
ESC any discount errors or codes that do not work
ESC all inquiries about wearing Tushbaby while pregnant
tone: Let the cx have the last word
Don't say "The code can ONLY be added" or similar, say " The code applies when you buy.."
Don't mention that your system is limited
Use a friendly tone!
Don't tell cx to stay subscribed to our newsletter or check our website for updates, let them know that as a text subscribers they'll be the first to know about upcoming deals
Use "texts subscriber" instead of "SMS subscriber"
Don't send long responses for order status inquiries, provide the order details instead if it's available
templates: Totebabys won't be restocked, use TBR shortcut
For inquiries about the tweed-style Tushbaby, pink Tushbaby, the snow leopard Tushbaby or new prints, use the "Tushbaby" temps
For inquiries if the TushBaby can be used for children with special needs OR if we provide a discount for them, use SND shortcut
Don't use the "PRU" shortcut
Don't use the "NRC" shortcut
If the cx asks for the price, use PRC shortcut
If cx says Tushbaby is out of their budget, use OMB shortcut, and don't comment on their financial situation or our prices
dos_and_donts: Don't ask the cx if there is anything else you can assist with, after a convo has been ESC
drive_to_purchase: Don't D2P when a cx just purchased
Don't D2P to upset/angry cx
promo_and_exclusions: All sales/promotions end at midnight PST
If a cx reaches out regarding a sale, do not refer them to the website
TikTok codes are tiktok-specific and can't be used on the website
Discount codes work on sale items, but not on bundles
Offers are not stackable at checkout

send_to_cs: If escalated do NOT send to CS
escalate: ESC if a cx wants to purchase an out of stock item
ESC if cx want someone from the cs team to call them directly
ESC when a cx asks for a call back
ESC if uncertain about refills or product specific questions
ESC if cx has issues registering
ESC if cx asks for help putting through an order
tone: Close the convo once the client takes over
Don't use too many exclamation points
Use more formal language such as "Hello" instead of "Hey"
Avoid using smiley faces/emojis
Avoid responding to anything related to politics
dos_and_donts: Always use your VPN when accessing their website & make sure you're sending US links
Don't ever release information on personnel related to the company
Don't share any authorized retailers, only boutiques
Don't ask cx to leave product reviews as they don't collect them
Don't offer holiday discounts/promos
Don't mention discounted items
drive_to_purchase: When D2P'ing, do not send links of the search results page, send either a related collection or product page
Do not recommend gift sets

scenarios.customerMessage2: I measured my head and it is 22".  Which would be better for me Capillus PRO S2 or Capillus Pro?  Also if I order today when will it be shipped?  I am out of town a lot Friday until Monday and I don't want it delivered and sitting on my porch.
scenarios.AgentMessage2:
Capillus: Thanks for letting me know. Regular caps fit most heads, up to 23" in circumference (comparable to a size 7 hat). Extra-large caps, comparable to a size 8 hat, are available upon request by scheduling a call with out customer service at: https://capillus.attn.tv/ai9f5wSzpVqX. For smaller hat sizes, as long as the cap is within 2 cm all around (3/4"), it is effective. Therefore, anyone with a head measuring 21" or larger will be fine with a standard Capillus cap.

Our processing time takes 2 business days. We aim to keep the shipping timeframe consistent, but it may be subject to change due to high volume sales. In the shopping cart, you will receive an Estimated Delivery Date and you will receive notification of any delay or cancellation of your order. Hope this helps!
scenarios.customerMessage3: Thanks for the info!
scenarios.AgentMessage3: Capillus: You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with?
scenarios.customerMessage4: No, that‚Äôs all.
scenarios.AgentMessage4: Capillus: Feel free to reach out anytime, I'm always here to help!
scenarios.customerMessage5: How do you ship?
scenarios.AgentMessage5: Capillus: Let me check on this with my team for you, I will be back with an update soon.

scenarios.customerMessage1: Glacier Oak bed frame with shelved headboard and desk
scenarios.AgentMessage1:
Sauder: I totally understand, finding the exact pieces you want can be really important for making your space feel complete.

Unfortunately, at the moment, we do not have a Glacier Oak bed frame with both a shelved headboard and desk together as one piece. However I do have a few very close options that might work depending on what you're trying to set up:

Here is a shelved headboard in Glacier Oak (full/queen):
https://sauder.attn.tv/arzAslmkISMA

And here's a desk in Glacier Oak that would pair nicely:
https://sauder.attn.tv/aagFQ_XDEbWP

For a bed frame option (Raven Oak finish):
https://sauder.attn.tv/a_uiivBuVaXs

I know it's not exactly the Glacier Oak bed + headboard + desk combo you described, and I can see why that's disappointing. Let me know what you think!

scenarios.customerMessage1: I didn't receive my recent purchase. It says delivered but the photo appears to be a different house
scenarios.AgentMessage1: Braun: I'm so sorry about this. If your tracking says the package was delivered but you haven't received it, I recommend checking around your home and with nearby houses, just in case it was dropped off by mistake. Also, check with anyone you live with, like family, roommates, or a landlord, to see if they accepted it for you. Sometimes packages are also held by property managers, an apartment office, or even your local post office. Let me know if you can't find it, I'm here to help!
scenarios.customerMessage2: I've done all of this and unfortunately nothing has shown up. The picture is obviously a different house but the address on the package was correct. Doesn't even resemble the appearance of a house in our neighborhood
scenarios.AgentMessage2: Braun: I'm really sorry for the inconvenience. Can you please share your order number and email so I can check on this with the team?
scenarios.customerMessage3: Confirmation (#434503)
scenarios.customerMessage4: Thank you
scenarios.AgentMessage3: Braun: Thank you for getting back to me and providing that information! Could you confirm the email address you used to place the order as well?
scenarios.customerMessage5: Bryanwyatt2@yahoo.com
scenarios.AgentMessage4: Braun: Thank you! Let me check on this with the team and I'll text you back once I have an update, please hang tight!
scenarios.customerMessage6: Thanks
scenarios.AgentMessage5: Braun: You're welcome, I'll keep you posted!
scenarios.customerMessage7: Any news on this ?
scenarios.AgentMessage6: Braun: Thanks for checking in. I haven't heard back from the team yet, but I'm keeping an eye on it and will update you as soon as I get some news. I appreciate your patience, and I'll make sure to keep you posted! Let me know if you need anything else in the meantime.

scenarios.SystemMessage55: Template used: "Are your gold plated items stamped?"; last updated: 2022-08-03 15:04:19.181
scenarios.AgentMessage1: GLD: Thanks for reaching out and I'm sorry for the confusion. Our Solid Gold items are stamped with the number of karats they contain. Our Vermeil pieces start with a .925 Sterling Silver base metal and are stamped to reflect that. The rest of our items (Yellow/White/Rose Gold Plated), don't contain a stamp, only our logo. I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

scenarios.customerMessage2: Are the credit cards supposed to fall out of the wallet without pushing the button?
scenarios.customerMessage3: I can literally shake the wallet, easily upside down one time in the credit card( your fake ones that came in it originally )slide out
scenarios.customerMessage4: Hello
scenarios.AgentMessage2: Ekster: I'm so sorry to hear the cards slide out with just a shake. They are built for fast card access at the push of a button.
scenarios.customerMessage5: Don't want to lose cards if I happen to hold it upside down.
scenarios.AgentMessage3: Ekster: The Ekster Cardholder Pro is designed to keep your cards secure, so they won't fall out even if the wallet is turned upside down. The card mechanism only ejects your cards when you intentionally activate it, giving you peace of mind that they'll stay in place during everyday use.
scenarios.customerMessage6: And that is why we got it. I will try it with real cards in just a moment.
scenarios.customerMessage7: Is Cardholder 2 the same model as Pro?
scenarios.AgentMessage4: Ekster: The Cardholder 2 and Cardholder Pro are different models. The Pro offers additional features and enhancements.
scenarios.customerMessage8: I need someone to call me. A real person.
scenarios.customerMessage9: Like now. Been dealing with mistakes since Christmas.
scenarios.AgentMessage5: Ekster: I totally understand your concern, and we truly apologize for the inconvenience. I'm a real person, and I'm part of our pre-sales department. scenarios.customerMessage14: Then I ordered a cash back plate. important: When sending a link, if you see a "/" at the end of the URL, remove it
escalate: ESC immediately if the order is delivered, but cx did not receive it
ESC if cx wants to use an expired code
ESC sales end date questions
ESC if the cx code shows the error "not valid"
Before ESC for retroactive discount requests, check if the item is on sale or if they met the minimum
Don't make suggestions of replacements - if unsure, ESC
ESC false advertising complaints
ESC if cx state they regret placing the order after the CANCEL/ORDER temp has been sent
Before ESC products not functioning properly
Don't ask for the cx's shipping address as secondary info, include their phone number instead
tone: Keep messages shorter and more direct
Don't use the term "cart tracking", or let cxs know we can see what they have in their cart
templates: If the cx asks where there order is, and it's a confirmed order within the standard processing and shipping time, only share the "Order status/order tracking" temp
If the cx reaches out saying they're having issue with their code, first use CWW temp
If cx needs assistance with brush function/operations use FOQ shortcut
For product complaints/bad experiences use PBE shortcut
If cx says they're dentists/hygienists & want to shop use RDH shortcut
If cx is a short amount away from reaching the $100 threshold for the welcome discount to apply use SRT shortcut
If cx ask why their order was canceled, use MOC shortcut
If cx purchased from their dentist and looking for rebate ($30, $20, $10 back) use RBT shortcut
For post-purchase issues with Amazon orders, use PS shortcut
For post-purchase issues where cxs are dental professionals, dentists, hygienists, use DPS shortcut
dos_and_donts: If customers are looking for brush heads always confirm what type of brush they have, iO or non iO
If you can't find the products on the website, refer to this one https://crest.com/en-us
Hold to policy and do not offer to check if deviation from policy is acceptable
If customers ask about the warranty registration code OR say it's not accepting theirs (they might refer to it as a promo code for registration)- send them this one OB59185 (it's always the same)
drive_to_purchase: For general recommendations use CFR shortcut
Always refer cxs to iO series products, when possible
promo_and_exclusions: The $85 welcome promo code isn't for % off, once applied a free item is added to the cart
Please check the last letters of a code to determine when they were sent
Discount codes do not work on Amazon

scenarios.customerMessage1: Take care of my order mix up please
scenarios.AgentMessage1: Comfrt: I'm sorry about that! Can you share with me what you need help with?
scenarios.customerMessage2: I've tried repeatedly to email info@comfrt.com but keep getting a canned message back. I was so pleased at first that they were taking care of the order mixup but then I never received a tracking number and still haven't received my (s) seafoam hoodie
scenarios.customerMessage3: I had been such a fan of the brand. This has left me frustrated
scenarios.AgentMessage2: Comfrt: I apologize for the frustration and inconvenience this has caused. This is not the experience we strive to provide for our customers. Since you already received an email from my team, it would be best to reply to them using the same email thread for any further requests. Please also check your spam and promo folders as well, as our emails sometimes end up there.
scenarios.customerMessage4: I've done that repeatedly to no avail
scenarios.customerMessage5: Nothing in junk/spam. Does this mean you're not going to do anything? Check on it?
scenarios.AgentMessage3: Comfrt: I'm so sorry that I can't help with this directly, but my system isn't set up for this type of issue. Our team is doing everything to respond to each inquiry in a timely manner. They should follow up with you in no time!
scenarios.customerMessage6: I cannot tell you how frustrated I am. I've even direct message Instagram. There's no way to get ahold of anyone at your company. I want what I paid for
scenarios.customerMessage7: You should be able to forward it to the right people so it gets flagged
scenarios.customerMessage8: I email and I get this message. I've already submitted online. It gets me nowhere
scenarios.customerMessage9: I know you personally are not at fault. Sorry if it feels I'm taking it out on you. I just don't know how to get my item
scenarios.AgentMessage4: Comfrt: I understand your concern and frustration. Based on the email I see on the 14th, it was routed to our fulfillment team to ship out. I know the timing is not ideal, but I'm afraid multiple emails for the same issue that's already being resolved can sometimes cause delays. Rest assured, the request was already sent over, and we're working to get the item shipped out.

If you have any further questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to contact me. We're here to help!

important: When sending a link, if you see a "/" at the end of the URL, remove it
escalate: ESC immediately if the order is delivered, but cx did not receive it
ESC if cx wants to use an expired code
ESC sales end date questions
ESC if the cx code shows the error "not valid"
Before ESC for retroactive discount requests, check if the item is on sale or if they met the minimum
Don't make suggestions of replacements - if unsure, ESC
ESC false advertising complaints
ESC if cx state they regret placing the order after the CANCEL/ORDER temp has been sent
Before ESC products not functioning properly
Don't ask for the cx's shipping address as secondary info, include their phone number instead
tone: Keep messages shorter and more direct
Don't use the term "cart tracking", or let cxs know we can see what they have in their cart
templates: If the cx asks where there order is, and it's a confirmed order within the standard processing and shipping time, only share the "Order status/order tracking" temp
If the cx reaches out saying they're having issue with their code, first use CWW temp
If cx needs assistance with brush function/operations use FOQ shortcut
For product complaints/bad experiences use PBE shortcut
If cx says they're dentists/hygienists & want to shop use RDH shortcut
If cx is a short amount away from reaching the $100 threshold for the welcome discount to apply use SRT shortcut
If cx ask why their order was canceled, use MOC shortcut
If cx purchased from their dentist and looking for rebate ($30, $20, $10 back) use RBT shortcut
For post-purchase issues with Amazon orders, use PS shortcut
For post-purchase issues where cxs are dental professionals, dentists, hygienists, use DPS shortcut
dos_and_donts: If customers are looking for brush heads always confirm what type of brush they have, iO or non iO
If you can't find the products on the website, refer to this one https://crest.com/en-us
Hold to policy and do not offer to check if deviation from policy is acceptable
If customers ask about the warranty registration code OR say it's not accepting theirs (they might refer to it as a promo code for registration)- send them this one OB59185 (it's always the same)
drive_to_purchase: For general recommendations use CFR shortcut
Always refer cxs to iO series products, when possible
promo_and_exclusions: The $85 welcome promo code isn't for % off, once applied a free item is added to the cart
Please check the last letters of a code to determine when they were sent
Discount codes do not work on Amazon

scenarios.AgentMessage1:
Birkenstock: I'm truly sorry for the inconvenience. I'm unable to limit the number of texts we send out, as we do our best to keep everyone informed about the latest news and promos. However, if you'd prefer not to receive any more messages from us, just let me know, and I'll be glad to coordinate this for you! 

Meanwhile, since you already sent us an email, I suggest waiting for our team's response. Have you already tried checking your spam or promo folders? Sometimes our emails end up there. 

Meanwhile, items may be returned in original purchase condition and packaging within 30 days of delivery, with the exception of select Last Chance items. Select Last Chance items are final sale (as shown on the site) and cannot be returned or exchanged. A Last Chance item can be identified by having a struck-thru base price, with a reduced price adjacent. More details at the link below:
https://birkenstock.attn.tv/aeK3OfpvgdtU

important: When sending a link, if you see a "/" at the end of the URL, remove it
escalate: ESC immediately if the order is delivered, but cx did not receive it
ESC if cx wants to use an expired code
ESC sales end date questions
ESC if the cx code shows the error "not valid"
Before ESC for retroactive discount requests, check if the item is on sale or if they met the minimum
Don't make suggestions of replacements - if unsure, ESC
ESC false advertising complaints
ESC if cx state they regret placing the order after the CANCEL/ORDER temp has been sent
Before ESC products not functioning properly
Don't ask for the cx's shipping address as secondary info, include their phone number instead
tone: Keep messages shorter and more direct
Don't use the term "cart tracking", or let cxs know we can see what they have in their cart
templates: If the cx asks where there order is, and it's a confirmed order within the standard processing and shipping time, only share the "Order status/order tracking" temp
If the cx reaches out saying they're having issue with their code, first use CWW temp
If cx needs assistance with brush function/operations use FOQ shortcut
For product complaints/bad experiences use PBE shortcut
If cx says they're dentists/hygienists & want to shop use RDH shortcut
If cx is a short amount away from reaching the $100 threshold for the welcome discount to apply use SRT shortcut
If cx ask why their order was canceled, use MOC shortcut
If cx purchased from their dentist and looking for rebate ($30, $20, $10 back) use RBT shortcut
For post-purchase issues with Amazon orders, use PS shortcut
For post-purchase issues where cxs are dental professionals, dentists, hygienists, use DPS shortcut
dos_and_donts: If customers are looking for brush heads always confirm what type of brush they have, iO or non iO
If you can't find the products on the website, refer to this one https://crest.com/en-us
Hold to policy and do not offer to check if deviation from policy is acceptable
If customers ask about the warranty registration code OR say it's not accepting theirs (they might refer to it as a promo code for registration)- send them this one OB59185 (it's always the same)
drive_to_purchase: For general recommendations use CFR shortcut
Always refer cxs to iO series products, when possible
promo_and_exclusions: The $85 welcome promo code isn't for % off, once applied a free item is added to the cart
Please check the last letters of a code to determine when they were sent
Discount codes do not work on Amazon

scenarios.AgentMessage1: Talentless: Hi, thanks for reaching out! How can I help?
scenarios.customerMessage2: Hi, I ordered the six men's premium tees on January 8th and paid for shipping that was 3-4 business days. However it says it's not arriving until the 21st but I am going out of town the 19th and need the shirts by then. How can it get to me by then or can I get refunded for the order and place a new order using express checkout to get the shirts in time. Thanks
scenarios.customerMessage3: I would also like to speak to a representative on the phone.
scenarios.AgentMessage2:
Talentless: I'm truly sorry about that. Are you referring to Order #704739? If so, upon checking, it has a standard shipping method. Our processing time takes 3-5 business days, and we usually ship via USPS, UPS, FedEx, or DHL. Once shipped, it will take 2-8 business days for domestic orders. Since the package is already with the courier, the most effective next step would be to reach out to them directly, as they typically have the most up-to-date tracking details. Have you had a chance to give them a call yet? They may be able to provide more insight or information. 

This number is for SMS only, so I'm not able to make or receive calls. You can give us a call at 1-562-296-1808.
scenarios.customerMessage4: Yes, I am referring to that order. Is it too late to cancel and get fully refunded. Also, if I place a new order and get express delivery, how long will that take to get delivered? Thanks again
scenarios.AgentMessage3: Talentless: As the order has shipped already we are not able to cancel it, however, you can return it for a refund. If you took express shipping it takes 1-2 days for shipping, but processing can still take 3-5 days if we are very busy. I hope this helps!

scenarios.customerMessage1:
I am wondering why I have received this code quite a few times for doing reviews and showing support and it never works for me. 

I think I have these codes going back months and never get to use any of the codes.
scenarios.AgentMessage1: Barbell Apparel: Thank you for reaching out and I'm sorry about that! Have you encountered any error messages? Also, could you kindly share a screenshot of the items in your cart? I'll be happy to look into the issue!
scenarios.customerMessage2:
It says already used? 
But I literally got the code this month and haven't done an order. 

Same has happened in the past multiple times. I am just getting frustrated getting sent codes that do not work.
scenarios.customerMessage3: Thank you for looking into this.
scenarios.AgentMessage2:
Barbell Apparel: Thank you so much for sending the screenshot, and I'm really sorry for the frustration this has caused. I completely understand how disappointing it is to receive a code and then not be able to use it.

From what I can see, there is already a promo code applied to your cart. Our system only allows one promotion to be used per order, so that is why the THANKYOU25 code is showing as already used and not applying an additional discount.

That said, I understand your concern since you mentioned this has happened multiple times, even when you have not placed an order. To make sure this is properly reviewed and resolved, the best next step is to email our team directly at team@barbellapparel.com. They can look into your account history and the promo codes in detail and make sure everything is working as it should.

Thank you for your patience, and we really appreciate your support. Please let me know if there is anything else I can help with in the meantime.

scenarios.customerMessage1: I was looking forward to doing this but Sarah and the "team" never followed up with one simple order matter so no i will not pay or obligate  myself to this barbell "elite" subscription/membership bc i cannot depend on a follow through with the terms of that agreement by Sarah or the "team". I only support this company solely based on the quality of the clothing AND the word of Chadd Wright and his 3 of 7 project company relationship/sponsorship by barbell.  He speaks so highly of "them" but i am a pee-on who can not tell him nor would he care to hear of one persons documented issues with his #1 sponsor who he speaks so highly of that i am sure he brings a lot of business to the company probably just as much value to the barbell company by the purchase of items by his viewers ( if not more so) than by the amount barbell invest in Chadd and the 3 of 7 project.
scenarios.AgentMessage1: Barbell Apparel: Thanks for sharing this, and I genuinely apologize for the inconvenience and frustration you've experienced with us. That's not the kind of experience we aim to provide. Since you've emailed the team, have you checked your spam and promo folders for the response from our team? Our emails end up there sometimes.
scenarios.customerMessage2: If you are aware of an email sent back plz send it to my inbox and or text please  because i do not filter or read my spam before deleting them. i do read all of my texts and no response in the matter was ever sent to my text. it is a simple matter and solution that should not be passed off as i didn't check my spam or promo. Barbell had no problem sending me all other correspondence especially the conversation between Sarah and i AND all the "promos" including the Elite membership so why woukd the most important correspondence be send and captured as a spam but non of the others?!?  Just resolve this simple matter i have proven that i am a repeat customer who should be valued as such or i do take my documented correspondence to 3of 7 somehow bc i am sure someone there as a fellow Christian would want fairness from a hard working supporter of them and their number one sponsor. Thank you in advance for your appreciation.
scenarios.AgentMessage2: Barbell Apparel: I'm truly sorry for the frustration this has caused. I completely understand how important this matter is to you, and I wish I could resolve it directly. Unfortunately, I don't have access to our emails, so I'm unable to retrieve or review the correspondence myself. The best way forward is to reach out to our team via email, as they are fully equipped to handle these concerns and can provide a proper resolution. Thank you for your patience and for being a valued supporter-we genuinely appreciate it.

scenarios.SystemMessage58: Template used: "What should I do if my package says delivered but I don't have it?"; last updated: 2025-10-24 16:24:01.166
scenarios.AgentMessage3: Modern Gents: I'm sorry for the confusion. I already checked, and your free Mini Cushion Studs in Gold were already delivered on Jan 12th. If your tracking says the package was delivered but you haven't received it, I recommend checking around your home and with nearby houses, just in case it was dropped off by mistake. Also, check with anyone you live with, like family, roommates, or a landlord, to see if they accepted it for you. Sometimes packages are also held by property managers, an apartment office, or even your local post office. Let me know if you can't find it, I'm here to help!

send_to_cs: If escalated do NOT send to CS
escalate: ESC if a cx wants to purchase an out of stock item
ESC if cx want someone from the cs team to call them directly
ESC when a cx asks for a call back
ESC if uncertain about refills or product specific questions
ESC if cx has issues registering
ESC if cx asks for help putting through an order
tone: Close the convo once the client takes over
Don't use too many exclamation points
Use more formal language such as "Hello" instead of "Hey"
Avoid using smiley faces/emojis
Avoid responding to anything related to politics
dos_and_donts: Always use your VPN when accessing their website & make sure you're sending US links
Don't ever release information on personnel related to the company
Don't share any authorized retailers, only boutiques
Don't ask cx to leave product reviews as they don't collect them
Don't offer holiday discounts/promos
Don't mention discounted items
drive_to_purchase: When D2P'ing, do not send links of the search results page, send either a related collection or product page
Do not recommend gift sets

scenarios.customerMessage1: Would T3 help with Adrenal Fatigue? Waking up at 3-4 hot at age 69?
scenarios.SystemMessage2: Template used: "How do you take Thyroid Adrenal Complex?"; last updated: 2022-07-10 17:21:56.580
scenarios.AgentMessage1:
Dr. Westin Childs: Thank you so much for reaching out. Yes, T3 can help with adrenal fatigue because adrenal stress often impairs the conversion of T4 to the active T3, leading to hypothyroid symptoms, and T3 directly stimulates cortisol, but it must be used carefully. I'd recommend our adrenal complex - https://drwc.attn.tv/aSZCQ92FxLkE 

For mild to moderate adrenal fatigue, we recommend that you take 2 capsules each morning (with a meal). For advanced adrenal fatigue you may need to take 2 capsules in the morning and 2 capsules at noon (for a total of 4 capsules each day). Taking this supplement with food will help reduce any issues with nausea. Don't take this supplement in the afternoon or it may make sleep difficult.

scenarios.SystemMessage9: Template used: "How do I view and claim my rewards? "; last updated: 2025-12-01 17:50:28.598
scenarios.AgentMessage1:
Julie Vos: Thank you for your purchase! That's a good question. Yes! You earn points with every purchase from JulieVos.com. You may redeem your points for a future order using the instructions below.

1. Visit our Rewards Page:
Visit https://julievos.attn.tv/aHvwLr6cV_tt
2. Log In or Join:
Once you're on the Rewards page, click the Get Started button, then select Login.
If you already have a Julie Vos account, please log in. If not, click Create account to set up a new account.
3. Scroll to "Redeem Rewards":
Once you're signed in, scroll down the page until you see the Redeem Rewards section. This is where you'll see how many points you have and how much they're worth.
Here's a screenshot to help you spot it easily: https://julievos.attn.tv/ajegdjxGHCcO

(This image should show the Redeem Rewards section with the slider and redeem button visible.)

4. Choose How Many Points to Use:
Use the slider to pick how many points you'd like to redeem. You'll see how much money you'll save based on your selection.
5. Click "Redeem":
After choosing your points, click the Redeem button. This will generate a unique discount code just for you.
6. Use the Code at Checkout:
At checkout, paste your code into the box that says "Discount code or gift card", then click Apply.
Helpful Tip:
If you ever lose track of your code, no worries! Just go back to the Redeemed tab in the Redeem Rewards section to view it again.
Points expire 12 months after they are earned, but don't worry - we'll send you a reminder ahead of time so you'll have the chance to use them before they expire.

If you run into any trouble at all, don't hesitate to reach back out, we're always happy to help!

scenarios.AgentMessage1:
State Line Tack: Hi there! We usually ship via USPS, and once shipped, it will take 7-10 business days domestically, depending on the method you choose at checkout. If you're referring to Order #1039562, the shipping method used was Economy Shipping. The order is already on its way with an expected delivery date of Jan 15. 

Since your order is already with the courier, the best way to get updates is to contact them directly. Have you tried giving them a call? They should have more detailed information for you. You can also check the status of your order here: https://slt.attn.tv/aQzFrybIEt_c

scenarios.customerMessage2: Hello
scenarios.AgentMessage1: Cardboard Cutout Standees: Sorry for the slow reply! We usually ship via UPS, and orders placed by 10 am on a business day will leave our facility the following business day. scenarios.customerMessage3: Thank you! Helpful!
scenarios.customerMessage4:
One more question. 
What group rates/cost 
would it be for 19 fat heads?
Thanks
scenarios.AgentMessage2: Cardboard Cutout Standees: You're welcome! I can definitely check on this for you. Can you let me know the size you're looking to get? Can I also have your e-mail address?
scenarios.customerMessage5:
Bethbert@yahoo.com.

Also, you may have on file the fatheads that were ordered last year for Lincoln Sudbury regional high school ski team. Whatever those sizes are is what we will take this year? 
I'm new at this but I will dig and see if o can find out size
scenarios.AgentMessage3: Cardboard Cutout Standees: Thank you. Do you happen to have the order number or the email address used to place last year's order so we can check? For Big Heads, the available sizes are 12, 24, 26, and 47 inches. Let me know!
scenarios.customerMessage6:
Hi,
So I got in touch with the person in charge of the fatheads last year and we ordered 24-26.
I copied and pasted her note below.
Seems like two other important things we would need is same size heads do the girls and boys. 
Also- a clear image of the faces so high quality prints.



Hi, yes that is the size I ordered. However, the boys' fat heads were a lot larger than the girls because they included the long hair on the girls within that size. If you want all faces the same size (which I would recommend because the size difference was significant) there is an option to trim long hair out of the fat head. It's up to you but just wanted to make note of that. Definitely make sure you are getting a print quality digital image for each senior so that they come out clearly. Hope this helps!

important: The client wants us to sound as ONE person
send_to_cs: Send to CS if cx sends photos of items from the website or if photos/screenshots are not coming through
escalate: Go the extra mile for cx's - ESC any q's you're unsure of
When ESC on weekdays, use ESC shortcut
When ESC on weekends, use WKD shortcut
ESC if a cx doesn't want to sign the package / provide a signature when receiving their order
ESC if a cx wants to know when an item will be available/back in stock
ESC if a cx wants to know where an item is shipped from
ESC immediately if a cx has an issue applying a code that we didn't share (it's not in the UI or website)
templates: If a cx is asking for updates after we've escalated - use DUP shortcut. Don't tell the cx, you haven't heard back
If a cx shares an incorrect response to the Journey asking them to share their birthday month - use BRE shortcut
tone: Do not take responsibility and directly apologize when the issue is not caused by the brand and all systems are functioning as intended
If the client takes over, do NOT send a message before 5 PM EST on the day the client responded
If the convo is escalated, do NOT send a message before 5 PM EST on the day it was escalated
drive_to_purchase: Don't tell cx's we'll restock an item which is not available on the website
dos_and_donts: Do not say that "my system is limited", limited access" or similar phrases
Do not say "I don't have better deals", "I don't have any codes available", or similar phrases
Do not say "sales collection", say "sale collection"
promo_and_exclusions: We have a brand-specific CWW template
If a cx shows any purchase intent, always share our code.
If cx asks for a percentage code, share 10WELCOME code for 10% off
Cx's can use a code and receive free shipping as well

scenarios.customerMessage1:
My hair about 6 or 7 months ago my hair turned skinny strands and the sides of my head above my ears I had a lot of breakage which sorta stopped but now my hair is growing extremely slow and growing thin strands. My hair is straight I don't have any processed products at the salon anymore I used to get highlights. 
What weird that my hair wasn't 
White ish grey tilk this happened.
I would like to try a serum that promotes healing the 
Roots and growing thicker strands of hair again. 
Does the shampoo and conditioner work to help that in a slight degree. 
I may be 76 on Jan 24 yet all my new doctors that I have now cannot believe my age they look at my medical chart because I look like late 50's early 60'
Long gevity is in my families genes 
Can we talk live I am a little confused on what to purchase
scenarios.AgentMessage1: Kerotin: Thank you for reaching out. I'm really sorry about what happened. It is not the experience that we want to have for our customers. You can call us at 877-831-3123 Monday-Friday 10am-6pm EST, or I can help via text, it might be faster.
scenarios.customerMessage2: Ok I will text
scenarios.customerMessage3:
So I presume you received my entire text? 
I know I need that to promote root and hair growth so my strands become a little fuller again.Does the Shampoo and conditioner help in anyway addressing the problem? 
What do you suggest? 
As I said I am going to be? 76 yet my new doctors tell me I look 15 to 20 years younger 
No I never had any type of surgery or Botox. Long gevity runs in my family. Oh and I don't want any fried foods I was brought up that way
scenarios.customerMessage4: Oh I apologize I do see you received my first entire text
scenarios.customerMessage6: Maybe number 6 too
scenarios.AgentMessage2:
Kerotin: Yes, I have! Thank you so much for sharing all of that. I understand your concern about the changes you've noticed and how unsettling it can feel to notice changes in your hair.

Based on what you described, I do recommend our Keratin Freshening Duo - https://kerotin.attn.tv/ahV2PJxHW6kp It is formulated to promote hair growth and help prevent hair loss. This line includes strengthening ingredients like Keratin and Biotin, along with growth supporting oils such as Rosemary Oil, which help nourish hair follicles, support the roots, and encourage stronger, fuller looking strands over time. The Dual Treatment line can help create a healthier scalp environment and support overall hair strength and growth.

I hope this helps, and please let me know if there's anything else I can assist with!

scenarios.AgentMessage3:
ChurchSource: Thanks for your patience! I just heard from the team, and we understand how important this is. Order CS780831 is an ebook order. You can read your ebook purchase in the free Glose app by downloading it to any compatible Apple* or Android** device from your Apple app or Google Play Store, or by going to glose.com
 
 1. Launch the app or visit glose.com, and from the menu select Log In
 2. Select Other Sign In Options
 3. Select HarperCollins
 4. Enter the email address and Password you used to purchase your eBook.
 5. Select the book you would like to read and chose Read or Resume
 
Here is a video example: https://churchsource.attn.tv/ah_LDOyW_Vwa
 
Unfortunately, since eBooks are unable to be returned, we are not able to offer any refunds on these orders. The exception to this rule is if you were to place a replacement order for the physical edition of the book and provide the new order number as proof of purchase. At that point we would be able to issue a credit for the eBook.

If you have any further questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to contact me. We're here to help!
scenarios.customerMessage6: No it was not an ebook. It was two Bibles

scenarios.customerMessage1: Do human beings check your text messages? I'm having trouble with your website.
scenarios.AgentMessage1: Stonewall Kitchen: I'm sorry to hear that. Yes, we monitor texts here, and I'm a real person. What specific issues are you experiencing? What's the error message? First, I might suggest trying to open the site in an incognito or private window to rule out any browser cache or extension issues.
scenarios.customerMessage2: Oh wonderful thank you! The problem I'm having is built into your website. I've been trying to get an order in since the day after Christmas if you can believe it. One thing or another always comes up. The latest is I get a message that says "one or more items in your cart is out of stock and we cannot fill your order. Please go back in and check availability". Well, that's a real pain in the patootie because I have about nine things in my cart. You're going to get a lot of cart abandonment this way.
scenarios.customerMessage3: It should tell me exactly what is out of stock.
scenarios.customerMessage4: 9 out of 10 customers would abandon the cart at this point. I have an internet business too, kelly green organic.com
scenarios.AgentMessage2:
Stonewall Kitchen: I'm so sorry you've been running into this, especially after trying to place an order for so long. I completely understand how frustrating it is to get that message without knowing which item is causing the issue. It's definitely not the experience we want for our customers.

Could you please send me a screenshot of the items currently in your cart? That way, I can check availability on my end and help you get your order completed. Once I see what's in your cart, I can figure out which items are in stock and help you move forward.
scenarios.customerMessage5: Ok. I'll let you know less to complain and more so that maybe you could work with your website and tweak it so that a customer would get notified exactly what to do and be able to check out easily. Like I said, I have an online business too. So I'll take a screenshot and here we go
scenarios.customerMessage6: Oh it gave you the wrong link earlier that's not my website. KellyGreenOrganic.com

scenarios.AgentMessage5:
Luminox Watches: Thanks for your patience! I just heard from the team, and we understand how important this is. Unfortunately, Luminox does not sell any parts. However, our authorized repair centre may be able to help you identify the part you are looking for.
 
Please see their contact information below:
 
Saltzman's Watches
e-mail: info@saltzmans-watches.com
phone: 401-735-2741 

If you have any further questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to contact me. We're here to help!
scenarios.customerMessage7: Do they make a larger size?
scenarios.customerMessage8: It's a new watch that does not fit it does not require a repair
scenarios.customerMessage9: Is that the only repair shop, I am in San Diego, not Rhode Island
scenarios.AgentMessage6: Luminox Watches: Thanks for clarifying! Luminox does offer larger-sized watches (including 45mm and above), so if the fit isn't right, exploring those models may be a better option than repair.
scenarios.customerMessage10: How would I know if they will fit
scenarios.SystemMessage5: Template used: "Sizing"; last updated: 2023-01-03 22:31:43.483
scenarios.AgentMessage7:
Luminox Watches: We can't guarantee an item would fit, but I'd recommend using our size guide to determine the best size dial for your wrist: https://luminox.attn.tv/aBIXqeKG1dv_ Just print at 100%, cut out the sizes you're considering, and hold up to your wrist to find the perfect fit.

Also, we don't sell any extra links on our website, which is why we advise you contact our authorized repair centre to confirm if they can adjust the size for you. We only have one repair center at this time.

important: When sending a link, if you see a "/" at the end of the URL, remove it
escalate: ESC immediately if the order is delivered, but cx did not receive it
ESC if cx wants to use an expired code
ESC sales end date questions
ESC if the cx code shows the error "not valid"
Before ESC for retroactive discount requests, check if the item is on sale or if they met the minimum
Don't make suggestions of replacements - if unsure, ESC
ESC false advertising complaints
ESC if cx state they regret placing the order after the CANCEL/ORDER temp has been sent
Before ESC products not functioning properly
Don't ask for the cx's shipping address as secondary info, include their phone number instead
tone: Keep messages shorter and more direct
Don't use the term "cart tracking", or let cxs know we can see what they have in their cart
templates: If the cx asks where there order is, and it's a confirmed order within the standard processing and shipping time, only share the "Order status/order tracking" temp
If the cx reaches out saying they're having issue with their code, first use CWW temp
If cx needs assistance with brush function/operations use FOQ shortcut
For product complaints/bad experiences use PBE shortcut
If cx says they're dentists/hygienists & want to shop use RDH shortcut
If cx is a short amount away from reaching the $100 threshold for the welcome discount to apply use SRT shortcut
If cx ask why their order was canceled, use MOC shortcut
If cx purchased from their dentist and looking for rebate ($30, $20, $10 back) use RBT shortcut
For post-purchase issues with Amazon orders, use PS shortcut
For post-purchase issues where cxs are dental professionals, dentists, hygienists, use DPS shortcut
dos_and_donts: If customers are looking for brush heads always confirm what type of brush they have, iO or non iO
If you can't find the products on the website, refer to this one https://crest.com/en-us
Hold to policy and do not offer to check if deviation from policy is acceptable
If customers ask about the warranty registration code OR say it's not accepting theirs (they might refer to it as a promo code for registration)- send them this one OB59185 (it's always the same)
drive_to_purchase: For general recommendations use CFR shortcut
Always refer cxs to iO series products, when possible
promo_and_exclusions: The $85 welcome promo code isn't for % off, once applied a free item is added to the cart
Please check the last letters of a code to determine when they were sent
Discount codes do not work on Amazon

scenarios.customerMessage1:
Hi
I have a lot of questions but am on the road right now ....I'm thinking of getting some diamond studs preferably lab grown. Can you shoot me the info on how they rate the lab grown diamonds
scenarios.AgentMessage1:
Brilliant Earth: Thank you for reaching out! Sorry, it seems there was an issue, and the image you sent didn't load properly on our end, but thanks for the details! 

Our lab diamonds are certified by independent diamond grading labs, and have an inscription that matches the number on the laboratory certificate. Lab grown diamonds have the same physical, chemical, and optical characteristics as natural diamonds, as well as the same fire, scintillation, and sparkle. They are real diamonds. 

Do you have any specific style, or material in mind? In the meantime, you can find some great diamond stud options here: https://brilliantearth.attn.tv/avx30l-0T-7p/
scenarios.customerMessage2: Most lab grown diamonds are much less than a diamond in cost ..however I am looking for white gold 1/2 to 3/4 caret each
scenarios.AgentMessage2: Brilliant Earth: Thanks for the info! What do you think about these Perfect Martini Lab Diamond Stud Earrings (1/2 ct. tw.) in 18K White Gold? https://brilliantearth.attn.tv/awK-3ltWqSZl/?=. This 3-prong martini setting keeps the metal minimal so more light can shine through the colorless lab diamond.
scenarios.customerMessage3: The real diamonds are finite & mined which makes them more valuable
scenarios.AgentMessage3: Brilliant Earth: I totally understand your concern. You may consider the Perfect 4-Prong Lab Diamond Stud Earrings (1/2 ct. tw.) in 18K White Gold here instead: https://brilliantearth.attn.tv/anbJfjFpVb4y It's available in 1/2 and 3/4 carat.

scenarios.customerMessage1: I still need assistance with my account
scenarios.AgentMessage1: SNIPES: I'm very sorry to hear this happened. I totally understand the frustration with this! Our team handles emails in the order they come in and sending additional ones will further delay the team's response. Rest assured that one of my colleagues will follow up with you in no time!
scenarios.customerMessage2:
Over the past week, my account has been subject to purchase restrictions due to fraud prevention measures. These restrictions are currently only in effect on your website, as my bank has already resolved the card restriction. I kindly request that you forward my case to a representative who can assist me.
I have consistently encountered issues with returning purchases. One instance involved a single item being canceled without being credited. I took the initiative to visit a physical store to seek assistance from your retail associates. They promptly issued me a gift card to complete my online order after undergoing the entire verification process at the store.
Therefore, I kindly request your assistance in resolving this matter.
scenarios.AgentMessage2: SNIPES: I'm sorry to hear about that. I'm really sorry for all the inconvenience. Kindly wait for our team's response. We are dealing with an influx of support messages but this does not make your concern any less important. The team is working as hard as possible to address each issue promptly. I know my apologies won't help in this situation but rest assured, I understand how frustrating this can be and I'm very sorry I can't provide you with an immediate solution. I'm thankful for your patience and understanding.

scenarios.customerMessage4: My account is still restricted
scenarios.AgentMessage3: SNIPES: I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We hope for your continued understanding, and thank you for allowing us to assist you.

MaxAroma: Thank you for reaching out! I'm really sorry, but I can't guarantee exact delivery dates, only an estimate in business days. Our standard processing time for in-stock items is 1-2 business days. We usually ship via USPS, FedEx and UPS, and once shipped, it will take 5-8 business days domestically and 7-12 business days internationally.

Don't ask for screenshots

scenarios.customerMessage7: I guess my last question is why should I pay NY sales tax when you are shipping out of state and there is not a store in NC. Usually, if there isn't a store in my state, the item is shipped to me but I don't pay sales tax.
scenarios.AgentMessage6: White & Warren: Great question! Sales tax is charged based on state tax laws, not store locations. New York requires sales tax to be collected on certain transactions, even when items are shipped out of state. If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to let me know.

scenarios.AgentMessage4:
Braun: Thank you for clarifying! Please note that after you place your order, it goes through an order processing stage (preparing, packaging, etc.), which can take up to 3 business days. Once it's handed off to the carrier, your selected shipping method will kick in from there. Orders are typically delivered within 5-8 business days via USPS. Actual delivery time depends on shipping distance and may vary. The amount of time it takes for you to receive a product will depend on how long it takes us to process your order and how long it takes the carrier to deliver the order to you once it is shipped. You'll get a tracking email as soon as your order ships. If you don't see it in your inbox, be sure to check your spam and promo folders; sometimes our emails end up there as well. 

I hope this clarifies it! Just to confirm, are we all set now?

scenarios.AgentMessage1:
HEYDUDE: I'm sorry to hear you haven't received your order yet! To confirm, are you referring to Order #14648049? If so, I see that this order was delivered on 1/15.

If your tracking says the package was delivered but you haven't received it, I recommend checking around your home and with nearby houses, just in case it was dropped off by mistake. Also, check with anyone you live with, like family, roommates, or a landlord, to see if they accepted it for you. Sometimes packages are also held by property managers, an apartment office, or even your local post office. Let me know if you can't find it, I'm here to help!

important: When sending a link, if you see a "/" at the end of the URL, remove it
escalate: ESC immediately if the order is delivered, but cx did not receive it
ESC if cx wants to use an expired code
ESC sales end date questions
ESC if the cx code shows the error "not valid"
Before ESC for retroactive discount requests, check if the item is on sale or if they met the minimum
Don't make suggestions of replacements - if unsure, ESC
ESC false advertising complaints
ESC if cx state they regret placing the order after the CANCEL/ORDER temp has been sent
Before ESC products not functioning properly
Don't ask for the cx's shipping address as secondary info, include their phone number instead
tone: Keep messages shorter and more direct
Don't use the term "cart tracking", or let cxs know we can see what they have in their cart
templates: If the cx asks where there order is, and it's a confirmed order within the standard processing and shipping time, only share the "Order status/order tracking" temp
If the cx reaches out saying they're having issue with their code, first use CWW temp
If cx needs assistance with brush function/operations use FOQ shortcut
For product complaints/bad experiences use PBE shortcut
If cx says they're dentists/hygienists & want to shop use RDH shortcut
If cx is a short amount away from reaching the $100 threshold for the welcome discount to apply use SRT shortcut
If cx ask why their order was canceled, use MOC shortcut
If cx purchased from their dentist and looking for rebate ($30, $20, $10 back) use RBT shortcut
For post-purchase issues with Amazon orders, use PS shortcut
For post-purchase issues where cxs are dental professionals, dentists, hygienists, use DPS shortcut
dos_and_donts: If customers are looking for brush heads always confirm what type of brush they have, iO or non iO
If you can't find the products on the website, refer to this one https://crest.com/en-us
Hold to policy and do not offer to check if deviation from policy is acceptable
If customers ask about the warranty registration code OR say it's not accepting theirs (they might refer to it as a promo code for registration)- send them this one OB59185 (it's always the same)
drive_to_purchase: For general recommendations use CFR shortcut
Always refer cxs to iO series products, when possible
promo_and_exclusions: The $85 welcome promo code isn't for % off, once applied a free item is added to the cart
Please check the last letters of a code to determine when they were sent
Discount codes do not work on Amazon

tone: Close the convo once the client takes over

dos_and_donts: Always use your VPN when accessing their website & make sure you're sending US links

drive_to_purchase: When D2P'ing, do not send links of the search results page, send either a related collection or product page
